title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
Introducing the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette! This professional makeup painting kit is perfect for both kids and adults, making it suitable for Halloween, FX, parties, and artists. 

The palette contains 20 vibrant colors, including gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white, with two different color types: flash and Aqua. The plastic case packaging ensures durability and convenience.

You can easily apply the face and body paint using either a sponge or brush. The oil-based formulation is non-toxic, skin-friendly, and easy to blend, providing a comfortable and long-lasting wear. The quick-dry and smudge-proof characteristics allow for hassle-free use, while the minimal rub-off and easy-to-wash properties make removal effortless. 

This versatile palette offers a variety of artistic and special effects, making it ideal for festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, stage performances, and of course, Halloween. You can create stunning looks such as crowns, costumes, bruises, blood effects, and even cosplay.

To remove the paint, simply use olive oil or a professional waterproof makeup remover. 

Experience the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette and unlock your creativity today!

This versatile palette can be applied using a sponge or brush, allowing you to create stunning looks such as crowns, costumes, bruises, blood effects, and cosplay. It is perfect for festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, stage performances, and of course, Halloween.

When it's time to remove the paint, simply use olive oil or a professional waterproof makeup remover. The UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette offers a variety of artistic and special effects, making it the go-to choice for both beginners and experienced artists alike. Get yours today and unleash your creativity!
